name: Body n' Soul
description:
A short puzzle platform game made in 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2021.

Story

For many years, a monk trained in the martial arts to achieve the peak physical form.

His name was Body.

Through diligent practice he gained the ability to project a sentient spirit out of his physique.

The spirit’s name was Soul.

Together they searched for a way to bring harmony between the physical and the spiritual worlds.

Controls

ButtonsActionsA/D, Left /RightMoveW, UpJumpSpaceAstral Projection
